content.question:
​

​The figure shows a base-<math alttext="10"><semantics><mn>10</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> logarithmic scale with point <math alttext="A"><semantics><mi>A</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> located at the geometric midpoint of the segment between the tick mark labeled <math alttext="100"><semantics><mn>100</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and the tick mark labeled <math alttext="1000"><semantics><mn>1000</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following statements is true about the value at the location of point <math alttext="A"><semantics><mi>A</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: The value is the average of <math alttext="10 squared"><semantics><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="10 cubed"><semantics><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The value is the average of <math alttext="0"><semantics><mn>0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="1000"><semantics><mn>1000</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The logarithm base <math alttext="10"><semantics><mn>10</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> of the value is <math alttext="2.5"><semantics><mn>2.5</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

The logarithm base <math alttext="10"><semantics><mn>10</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> of the value is <math alttext="50 percent sign"><semantics><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> greater than the logarithm base <math alttext="10"><semantics><mn>10</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> of <math alttext="10 squared"><semantics><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​The logarithm base <math alttext="10"><semantics><mn>10</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> of the value is <math alttext="2.5"><semantics><mn>2.5</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
